summary: RECALL NUMBER 02V286000  I HAVE THE PROBLEM THAT IS STATED ON THE RECALL.  I CALLED PONTIAC AT 188 762 2737 AROUND 12-12-02.  THEY SAID THE RECALL SHOULD NOT HAVE BEEN RELEASED TO THE PUBLIC YET.  I WOOULD HAVE TO WAIT TILL DEALER GOT THE RECALL NOTICE BEFORE THEY WOULD  PAY TO  HAVE MY CAR FIXED.THAT IT WOULD BE THE FIRST OF THE YEAR BEFORE THE DEALERS GOT THE NOTICE.     MY CAR HAS BEEN PARKED SENSE THEN. AM A FRAID TO DRIVE IT.  SOMETHING NEEDS TO BE  DONE.I NEED A LOANER CAR OR MINE FIX.  CAN YOU HELP ?
